DataElement.preferredName: Workflow Action Computer Configuration Applicable Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A thing done.:Refers to 1) the way a computer's operating system is set up, 2) the total combination of hardware components that make up the computer system, or 3) the specific software settings that have been established for the system._Having relevance; capable of being applied.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A thing done.:Refers to 1) the way a computer's operating system is set up, 2) the total combination of hardware components that make up the computer system, or 3) the specific software settings that have been established for the system.

Concepts.definition: The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.

Refers to 1) the way a computer's operating system is set up, 2) the total combination of hardware components that make up the computer system, or 3) the specific software settings that have been established for the system.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having relevance; capable of being applied.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Having relevance; capable of being applied.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
